title: CANCELLED

text: Oh, their ship is massive! There's no way to stop it!  Wait a minute, jackets!

title: CANCELLED
text: Oh no.

title: CANCELLED
text: If people don't wear jackets they could get cold. A cold is caused by a virus. A viru- a computer virus! We could make a computer virus and send it to their ships to disable their computers!

text: That doesn't make any God-damned sense!

text: Back at universal network headquarters. The Joozians have ice packs on their heads, recovering from the raunch they experienced the night before

title: CANCELLED
text: Oh, God. Eh eh, my head.  What did we do?

text: Oh man, I can't believe I sucked your jagon.

text: Oh God, we did suck each other's jagons! You kids won't tell anybody about this, right??

text: The Earth show can still be good. Just erase everyone's memory so we don't know we're a show.

text: I'm sure you'll see that if you give our world time, it will become even more outrageous and violent.

title: CANCELLED
text: Attention universe! Be sure to tune in next week for another exciting episode of... Earth! The Asians  are reeeally steamed at the Russians . The zebras try to get along with the buffalo.
